description: A React component named VideoModal that provides a video playback modal with controls for skipping, adjusting playback speed, and displaying video metadata along with a multi-camera view.

methods.name: VideoModal
methods.description: React functional component displaying a modal with video controls, metadata, and multi-camera view.

methods.name: onReady
methods.description: Callback function initializing the video player API.

methods.name: skip
methods.description: Function to skip forward or backward in video playback.

methods.name: setRate
methods.description: Adjusts the playback speed of the video.
